entry.title: Heavy-Duty Outdoor Storage Container
entry.summary:
Vendor: OEM
Type: Storage Container
Price: 191.80

  • Store anything from garden supplies, animal feed, fertilizer, sporting goods, ice melt, salt/sand to pool supplies all year round
  • Thick-walled, durable polyethylene construction
  • Double-walled reinforced lid
  • Molded forklift channels and recessed hand holes
  • Knuckle and rod reinforced hinge design
  • Weather resistant, corrosion free
  • Ideal for schools, public works, parks and recreation, subways, bus terminals and any public/private walkway
  • Stacks 10 per skid or 10 high in a trailer un-skidded
  • 1-year warranty
  • Not lockable
